docs.summary: Integrate your payment service provider with Wix to allow merchants process payments on Wix

params.name: credentials
params.doc:
Set of key-value pairs. Free format of the fields that describes merchant credentials for a PSP account.
 The format must be specified in  [Wix Developers Center](https://dev.wix.com/) beforehand or notified manually.
 It will be filled by merchant according to JSON schema during onboarding process and will be passed to a Payment Service Provider as is.

params.name: country
params.doc: The country in which the merchant will provide their services, in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

params.name: currency
params.doc: Code for the merchant's preferred [currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).

params.name: mode
params.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: wixMerchantId
params.doc: Wix merchant ID.

docs.summary:
This payment plugin endpoint is triggered when a merchant provides required data to connect their PSP account to a Wix site.
The plugin has to verify merchant's credentials, and ensure the merchant has an operational PSP account.
> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by a payment plugin and can have an arbitrary URL.
> So please ignore the **Authorization** and **POST** sections below as well as the **Try It Out** button.

examples.title: Connecting with numeric and boolean credentials

params.name: wixTransactionId
params.doc: Wix transaction ID.

params.name: paymentMethod
params.doc:
Payment method supported by the payment service provider.
These values will be displayed to the end-user upon checkout and will be passed to the payment service provider
to understand what payment method a user selected on the Wix side.
In case `paymentMethod:creditCard` field `paymentMethodData` will be initialized with `card`data.

params.name: merchantCredentials
params.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Service Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

params.name: order
params.doc: Order information.

params.name: mode
params.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: installments
params.doc: Number of payment installments.

params.name: wixMerchantId
params.doc: Wix merchant ID.

params.name: paymentMethodData
params.doc:
Payment method data information. Currently this data will be accessible in case `paymentMethod` equals to `creditCard`.
Please note that this call initiated in case you added *creditCard* as a payment method in the [Wix Developers Center](https://dev.wix.com).

params.name: fraudInformation
params.doc: Information in case of fraud.

docs.summary:
This payment plugin endpoint is triggered when a buyer pays on a Wix site.
The plugin has to process this payment request but prevent double payments for the same `wixTransactionId`.
> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by a payment plugin and can have an arbitrary URL.
> So please ignore the **Authorization** and **POST** sections below as well as the **Try It Out** button.

examples.title: Payment approved instantly
Payment declined instantly
Payment pending
3DS verification required

params.name: wixTransactionId
params.doc: Wix transaction ID.

params.name: wixRefundId
params.doc: Refund ID.

params.name: pluginTransactionId
params.doc: Provider transaction ID.

params.name: merchantCredentials
params.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Service Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

params.name: refundAmount
params.doc:
Total amount to pay in a currency’s smallest unit. In the example it's a $10.00 payment.
The amount includes all extra charges that are described in the order object like shipping, taxes, etc.

params.name: mode
params.doc: Transaction mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: reason
params.doc: Reason for refund. Defined by the merchant.

docs.summary:
This payment plugin endpoint is triggered when a merchant refunds a payment made on a Wix site.
The plugin has to process this refund request but prevent double refunds for the same `wixRefundId`.
> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by a payment plugin and can have an arbitrary URL.
> So please ignore the **Authorization** and **POST** sections below as well as the **Try It Out** button.

params.name: event
params.doc: Provider platform event.

docs.summary:
This Wix endpoint is used by a payment plugin to send payment state updates to Wix.
> You cannot try out this endpoint because an `Authorization` header value has to be obtained
> with OAuth 2.0 client credentials flow for a specific scope.
> So please ignore the **Authorization** section below as well as the **Try It Out** button.

examples.title: Refund failed, initiated by Wix
Refund succeeded, not initiated by Wix

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs. Free format of the fields that describes merchant credentials for a PSP account.
 The format must be specified in  [Wix Developers Center](https://dev.wix.com/) beforehand or notified manually.
 It will be filled by merchant according to JSON schema during onboarding process and will be passed to a Payment Service Provider as is.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: credentials
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs. Free format of the fields that describes merchant credentials for a PSP account.
 The format must be specified in  [Wix Developers Center](https://dev.wix.com/) beforehand or notified manually.
 It will be filled by merchant according to JSON schema during onboarding process and will be passed to a Payment Service Provider as is.

members.name: country
members.doc: The country in which the merchant will provide their services, in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Code for the merchant's preferred [currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).

members.name: mode
members.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

members.name: wixMerchantId
members.doc: Wix merchant ID.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Merchant credentials that will be used by Wix to make a payment on behalf of the merchant.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: credentials
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Merchant credentials that will be used by Wix to make a payment on behalf of the merchant.

members.name: accountId
members.doc: Merchant account ID. This must not be changed over the lifetime of their account.

members.name: accountName
members.doc: Merchant account name.

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: Reason code predefined by Wix that indicates call result.

members.name: errorCode
members.doc: Error code specific for a Payment Service Provider.

members.name: errorMessage
members.doc: Error description specific for a Payment Service Provider.

members.name: mode
members.doc: This field is ignored, do not send it.

members.name: pluginRefundId
members.doc: Refund identifier on the side of a *Payment Service Provider*.

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: Reason code predefined by Wix that indicates call result.

members.name: errorCode
members.doc: Error code specific for a Payment Service Provider.

members.name: errorMessage
members.doc: Error description specific for a Payment Service Provider.

members.name: status
members.doc: This field is ignored, do not send it.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Service Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: wixTransactionId
members.doc: Wix transaction ID.

members.name: wixRefundId
members.doc: Refund ID.

members.name: pluginTransactionId
members.doc: Provider transaction ID.

members.name: merchantCredentials
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Service Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

members.name: refundAmount
members.doc:
Total amount to pay in a currency’s smallest unit. In the example it's a $10.00 payment.
The amount includes all extra charges that are described in the order object like shipping, taxes, etc.

members.name: mode
members.doc: Transaction mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund. Defined by the merchant.

members.name: card
members.doc: Credit card information.

members.name: ideal
members.doc: IDeal payment information.

members.name: number
members.doc: Credit card number.

members.name: year
members.doc: Card expiration date - year.

members.name: month
members.doc: Card expiration date - month.

members.name: cvv
members.doc: Card verification value (CVV).

members.name: holderName
members.doc: Card holder's full name.

members.name: remoteIp
members.doc: Customer (buyer) IP address.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Buyer's first name.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Buyer's last name.

members.name: company
members.doc: Buyer's company name.

members.name: address
members.doc:
Billing or delivery address line.
This field represents a street and house number concatenation.

members.name: street
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: houseNumber
members.doc: House number.

members.name: city
members.doc: City.

members.name: state
members.doc: State.

members.name: zipCode
members.doc: Zip code.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Country of a buyer.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone of a buyer.

members.name: fax
members.doc: Fax of a buyer in free form format.

members.name: email
members.doc: Email of a buyer.

members.name: id
members.doc: Specific Tax id for merchant country.

members.name: type
members.doc: Specific Tax type for merchant country.

members.name: buyerId
members.doc: Free format unique buyer identifier assigned by Wix.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc: Buyer language in [locale](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Locale_(computer_software)) format.

members.name: successUrl
members.doc: URL destination to merchants site in case of successful payment.

members.name: errorUrl
members.doc: URL destination to merchants site in case of failed payment.

members.name: cancelUrl
members.doc: URL destination to merchants site in case of payment cancellation.

members.name: pendingUrl
members.doc: URL destination to merchants site in case of pending payment.

members.name: pluginTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction identifier on the side of a Payment Service Provider.

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: Reason code predefined by Wix that indicates call result.

members.name: errorCode
members.doc: Error code specific for a Payment Service Provider.

members.name: errorMessage
members.doc: Error description specific for a Payment Service Provider.

members.name: redirectUrl
members.doc: Web page URL where a buyer can proceed with a payment.

members.name: status
members.doc: This field is ignored, do not send it.

members.name: bin
members.doc: Card bin, first six digits

members.name: lastFour
members.doc: Card last four digits

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Service Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: wixTransactionId
members.doc: Wix transaction ID.

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc:
Payment method supported by the payment service provider.
These values will be displayed to the end-user upon checkout and will be passed to the payment service provider
to understand what payment method a user selected on the Wix side.
In case `paymentMethod:creditCard` field `paymentMethodData` will be initialized with `card`data.

members.name: merchantCredentials
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Service Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

members.name: order
members.doc: Order information.

members.name: mode
members.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

members.name: installments
members.doc: Number of payment installments.

members.name: wixMerchantId
members.doc: Wix merchant ID.

members.name: paymentMethodData
members.doc:
Payment method data information. Currently this data will be accessible in case `paymentMethod` equals to `creditCard`.
Please note that this call initiated in case you added *creditCard* as a payment method in the [Wix Developers Center](https://dev.wix.com).

members.name: fraudInformation
members.doc: Information in case of fraud.

members.name: id
members.doc: Merchant order ID. Can be used by a merchant to correlate payment on Wix and on provider side.

members.name: totalAmount
members.doc:
Total amount to pay in a currency’s smallest unit. In example it's a $10.00 payment.
The amount includes all extra charges that are described in the order object like shipping, taxes, etc.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Code for the merchant's preferred [currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).

members.name: id
members.doc: Item ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Item name provided by the merchant.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Item quantity.

members.name: price
members.doc: Item price.

members.name: description
members.doc: Item description provided by the merchant.

members.name: weightInKg
members.doc: Item weight in KG provided by the merchant.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Calculated taxes applied for the full order.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Order shipping cost.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount amount applied to order.

members.name: event
members.doc: Provider platform event.

members.name: pluginId
members.doc: This field is ignored, do not send it.

members.name: resource
members.doc: Resource specifies event type based on its content.

members.name: refund
members.doc: Refund event type.

members.name: transaction
members.doc: Transaction event type.

members.name: wixTransactionId
members.doc: Wix transaction ID.

members.name: pluginRefundId
members.doc: Payment provider refund ID.

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: Wix predefined [reason code](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/payment-provider/payment-provider-spi/reason-codes).

members.name: amount
members.doc: Refunded amount.

members.name: wixRefundId
members.doc: Wix refund ID. In case refund was performed via Wix admin panel by merchant.

members.name: errorCode
members.doc: Payment provider's own error code.

members.name: errorMessage
members.doc: Payment provider's error description with details of the decline.

members.name: wixTransactionId
members.doc: Wix transaction ID.

members.name: pluginTransactionId
members.doc: Payment Provider transaction ID.

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: Wix predefined [reason code](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/payment-provider/payment-provider-spi/reason-codes).

members.name: errorCode
members.doc: Payment provider's error code.

members.name: errorMessage
members.doc: Payment provider's error description with details of the decline.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • undefined
  • live
  • sandbox

Possible values are:
  • APPROVED
  • PENDING
  • CANCELED
  • DECLINED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • DUPLICATE
  • FRAUDULENT
  • REQUESTED_BY_CUSTOMER

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ING
  • RABOBANK
  • ABN_AMRO
  • SNS_BANK
  • BUNQ
  • ASN_BANK
  • REGIOBANK
  • TRIODOS_BANK
  • KNAB
  • VAN_LANSCHOT
  • HANDELSBANKEN
  • REVOLUT

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • APPROVED
  • PENDING
  • CANCELED
  • DECLINED

Possible values are:
  • undefined
  • physical
  • digital
